extendedInfo.description: CLASSIC ARCADE SHOOTER R-TYPE IS BACK! Let's go back in the 80's with this classic old-school shoot'em up! One of the biggest arcade game will make you travel back in the day. Be ready to have fun with this old-school side-shooter game!INCLUDING ORIGINAL FEATURES!The game is the challenging R-Type you used to play before. And we kept all its specifics, just the way you remember it! Fly through 8 levels with 3 different control options. Play in two difficulty levels. Upgrade with new weapons, power-ups, and attachments. Defeat 8 unique bosses and waves of various enemies.FEEL THE BLAST!Blast off and strike the evil Bydo Empire! Don't be shy and use your best shot to take them down! It's retro, it's fun and it's also hard to master. Be the best ever to finish this masterpiece!Xperia PLAY optimized. Zeemote support.MOGA and MOGA Pro controller support(C)IREM SOFTWARE ENGINEERING INC.(C)2011 ported on Android by DotEmu SAS.Let's keep in touch!VISIT US: www.DotEmu.comFOLLOW US: twitter.com/DotEmuLIKE US: facebook.com/DotEmuWATCH US: youtube.com/DotEmu

reviews.title: Difficult to play
reviews.comment: Ok but unplayable without a game pad.
reviews.author: Andy Dufilie

reviews.title: ITS ALL GOOD
reviews.comment: Loved original arcade & had it on spectrum & Sega master system,& this version is very good too.would love to play sum other old old games on my xperia z like TARGET RENEGADE, WOLF,GHOSTS N GOBLINS to name but a few
reviews.author: Mi Opinion

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Control issues fixed and working great with a dualshock controller.  Possible one of the few apps supporting for one.  Using build in support from xperia update.
reviews.author: Philip Lau

reviews.title: Best Side Shooter of all time
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this game to be released on android for years. Up to stage 3 which feels like stage 10, very challenging and addictive, love the power ups and if you don\'t die they just keep getting better For the price its a steel.
reviews.author: Rob Baggerman

reviews.title: Just like the good ol\' days
reviews.comment: Brings back the memories of one bloody hard game! Finger gets in the way though but 5 stars for the nostalgia effect
reviews.author: Saqib Ali

reviews.title: Lovely sidescroller.
reviews.comment: R-type brings sidescroller nostalgia to touch devices, great game!

reviews.title: So close
reviews.comment: Best game I have found that as close to the original.
reviews.author: Paul Hickox

reviews.title: Classic Still Entertains
reviews.comment: As per the title, R-Type is a timeless classic that still delivers the goods. Auto fire is appreciated as playing on a touch screen makes what would have been rapid button presses more difficult. Saying this, the game supports a sixaxis/dualshock 3 which is a massive bonus, but I\'m not sure the touch flying controls make for the most authentic experience as it becomes ridiculously easy to move very fast thus making it a bit too easy. Thankfully an on screen d-pad is also available so everyone is catered for
reviews.author: Alex Evans

reviews.title: Perfect conversion
reviews.comment: Loved this game in my youth.I had it on my zx spectrum which was the best version ever, better than the original !!. This is a perfect port of the arcade game and just as hard!!The touch control works surprisingly well ; I may have to invest in a moga controller though.Overall excellent - buy with confidence!
reviews.author: anton mead

reviews.title: Nice port to android
reviews.comment: Brilliant retro shooter a must have

reviews.title: So cool
reviews.comment: Love this game just wish my reactions were faster lol,smooth as silk and a proper time killer
